1.0.name: wordpress/featured-posts-grid
1.0.description:
Live Demo More Info Comments/Suggestions About Author

This plugin will display a grid of posts in any desired location within a template or post. The appearance is highly customizable via the admin options menu (colors, drop shadows, & more).

If there are any additional features or bug fixes you would like to see in future versions, feel free to contact me.

If you find this plugin useful please remember to rate it and comment.
